channel.title: attack.t1027.004 on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in attack.t1027.004 on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Application Whitelisting Bypass via Dnx.exe
item.description: Execute C# code located in the consoleapp folder

item.title: Dynamic C Sharp Compile Artefact
item.description: When C# is compiled dynamically, a .cmdline file will be created as a part of the process. Certain processes are not typically observed compiling C# code, but can do so without touching disk. This can be used to unpack a payload for execution

item.title: Suspicious Parent of Csc.exe
item.description: Detects a suspicious parent of csc.exe, which could by a sign of payload delivery

item.title: Visual Basic Command Line Compiler Usage
item.description: Detects successful code compilation via Visual Basic Command Line Compiler that utilizes Windows Resource to Object Converter.
